tasks.title: Fix Remaining TypeScript Compilation Errors
tasks.description: Resolve TypeScript compilation errors in enhanced-roles and performance-monitoring controller tests
success_criteria: npm run typecheck passes without errors

tasks.title: Fix Linter Errors - IMMEDIATE
tasks.description: Fix 0 errors and 0 warnings found in recently edited files: package.json
success_criteria: All linter errors in edited files resolved
development/linter-errors.md shows no issues for edited files
Code passes linting without warnings or errors

tasks.title: Fix ESLint Violations in Test Files
tasks.description: Resolve ESLint errors in active-executions test and other test files
success_criteria: All ESLint errors in test files resolved
npm run lint passes without errors
Async functions properly use await expressions

tasks.title: Fix Failing Integration Tests
tasks.description: Resolve failing integration tests in public API endpoints with scopes
success_criteria: npm run test completes without failures
Public API endpoint tests with scopes work correctly

tasks.title: Enhance Test Coverage Reporting
tasks.description: Ensure comprehensive test coverage reporting is properly configured and working

tasks.title: Create Quality Improvement Tasks
tasks.description: Analyze project quality issues and create specific tasks to reach 100% quality for all strikes
tasks.prompt:
Project quality assessment shows issues preventing 100% strike success:

Quality Status:
- Strike 1 (Build): 50%
- Strike 2 (Lint): 70%  
- Strike 3 (Tests): 30%

Issues Found:
- Build Verification: Build command fails
- Lint and Code Quality: No ESLint configuration found
- Test Coverage and Success: Tests are failing
- Test Coverage and Success: No coverage script defined

TASK: Analyze these quality gaps and create specific improvement tasks to bring ALL strikes to 100% quality. Create tasks for:
1. Build issues (missing dependencies, build failures, configuration)
2. Code quality issues (lint errors, style violations, code standards)
3. Testing issues (failing tests, missing coverage, test setup)

Insert all improvement tasks BEFORE the strike review tasks. Strikes should always remain last in the task list.
success_criteria: All quality issues identified and analyzed
Specific improvement tasks created for each quality gap
Tasks properly prioritized and ordered before strikes

tasks.title: Fix TypeScript ESLint Safety Errors
tasks.description: Resolve @typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any and @typescript-eslint/no-unsafe-* errors to improve type safety

tasks.title: Fix Async/Await ESLint Errors
tasks.description: Resolve @typescript-eslint/require-await errors by adding proper await expressions or removing async keywords
success_criteria: Async functions properly use await or are converted to sync

tasks.title: Fix Import Ordering ESLint Errors
tasks.description: Resolve import-x/order errors by properly organizing import statements

tasks.title: Fix Naming Convention ESLint Errors
tasks.description: Resolve @typescript-eslint/naming-convention errors by following proper naming standards
success_criteria: Object properties follow camelCase, snake_case, or UPPER_CASE standards

tasks.title: Establish and Meet Test Coverage Thresholds
tasks.description: Set up proper test coverage thresholds and ensure all modules meet minimum coverage requirements
success_criteria: Jest coverage thresholds configured in package.json

tasks.title: Fix Failing Test Suites
tasks.description: Identify and fix any failing test suites to achieve 100% test pass rate
success_criteria: npm run test exits with code 0
No flaky or intermittent test failures
